backend/main.mo: Defines core types for users, tasks, task history, audit logs, and comparison utilities, and includes blob storage mixin logic.
feature_evidence.json: Contains a feature evidence report describing a requirement to double a header logo size and its related files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten summaries of various frontend files covering routing, dashboards, UI components, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme definitions using OKLCH colors with light and dark mode variables and global style rules.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document for mounting the React app with a rebuild trigger comment.
frontend/public/rebuild-trigger.txt: Stores a timestamp and build version used to trigger frontend rebuilds.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app controller handling authentication, profile setup flow, and routing to assistant or manager dashboards with an error boundary wrapper.
frontend/src/components/AppErrorBoundary: React error boundary component that catches runtime errors and shows a reload prompt.
frontend/src/components/AssistantDetailV: Displays detailed assistant info including overtime stats, CSV export, task habits, charts, and history table with manager actions.
frontend/src/components/AssistantList.ts: Renders a scrollable list of assistants using avatars and overtime totals with selection handling.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Renders the app header with theme toggle, user profile controls, avatar modals, and logout handling.
frontend/src/components/ManagerAnalytics: Builds overtime analytics for assistants, including bar charts and summary rows using fetched totals.
frontend/src/components/OvertimeChart.ts: Generates a cumulative overtime trend chart from entries, supporting line or bar variants with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/components/OvertimeForm.tsx: Provides a form to add or use overtime with validation, submission handling, and UI feedback.
Displays searchable, paginated overtime history with support for editing the latest entry.
Shows a summary card of total overtime days, hours, and minutes with loading placeholders.
frontend/src/components/profile/AvatarMo: Modal for changing a user's avatar via image upload or selecting from preset avatars, saving updates through backend mutations.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileA: Renders a user's avatar using a profile picture, preset image, or fallback initials/icon with dynamic sizing.
frontend/src/components/ProfileDialog.ts: Displays and edits user profile data including avatar, username, role, and editable initials with save validation.
frontend/src/components/todo/AuditLogVie: Shows a searchable and filterable audit log of task actions, pulling task titles and formatting timestamps.
frontend/src/components/todo/EvidenceIma: Dialog displaying a full-size preview of a task evidence image with a close button.
frontend/src/components/todo/MarkTaskDon: Dialog for completing a task, allowing optional comment and photo upload before submitting completion data.
frontend/src/components/todo/TaskComplet: Displays the user who completed a task, showing their avatar and name or initials.
Handles file or camera-based photo capture, validates images, and returns selected photo data and preview URLs.
frontend/src/components/todo/TaskLedgerD: Displays a task’s audit history with timestamps, actions, and optional evidence photo previews.
frontend/src/components/todo/TaskPrefere: Lets admins view and update assistants’ task preferences with selectable assistants and inline preference editing.
frontend/src/components/todo/ToDoSection: Main task management section handling task CRUD, marking tasks done, pin toggling, filtering, and auto-refresh.
frontend/src/components/todo/ToDoTable.t: Renders the task list with urgency indicators, action buttons, image previews, and access to task history.
frontend/src/components/todo/ToDoTaskDia: React dialog for creating, editing, validating, and deleting to-do tasks with frequency selection.
frontend/src/constants/dentalPresets.ts: Defines 24 dental-themed preset avatar objects and a helper to fetch one by ID.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Initializes and provides a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication state, login handling, and stored identity loading via React context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, avatars, and tasks through the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useTheme.ts: Manages light, dark, and system theme selection with persistence and automatic system preference handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus extensive light/dark theme CSS variables for colors and UI elements.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AssistantDashboard.ts: Renders the assistant dashboard with tabs for to‑dos and overtime tracking, including forms, summaries, and charts.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Displays the login screen and triggers Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/pages/ManagerDashboard.tsx: Provides manager views for team management, analytics, audit logs, and to‑do tools with assistant selection and deletion handling.
frontend/src/pages/ProfileSetupPage.tsx: Collects username, initials, and language to create a new assistant profile with validation and registration.
frontend/src/utils/externalBlobUrl.ts: Generates a usable URL for an external blob, preferring direct URLs and falling back to object URLs.
frontend/src/utils/overtimeDates.ts: Utility functions for formatting overtime dates, getting today's date, and checking for future dates.
frontend/src/utils/overtimeStyles.ts: Returns CSS classes for overtime entry cells based on whether time was added or used.
frontend/src/utils/photoValidation.ts: Validates photo uploads for allowed types and maximum file size.
frontend/src/utils/presetTileColors.ts: Provides deterministic color schemes for avatar preset tiles based on preset ID.
frontend/src/utils/taskHabits.ts: Computes task completion metrics, formats completion history, and provides helpers for timestamps and preference labels/colors.
frontend/src/utils/todoDates.ts: Provides helpers for mapping task frequencies to labels and computing next due dates, formatted due strings, and urgency scores using workday logic.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and managing hash-based parameter cleanup.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind setup extending theme colors, radii, animations, and shadows, and enabling dark mode and plugins.
project_state.json: JSON describing the project’s state, goals, feature requests, and deployment intentions for the Internet Computer.
